recommendations.title: Implement Memory Pooling
recommendations.description: Use object pooling for frequently created/destroyed objects
recommendations.implementation: Create memory pools for GLYPH tokens, API responses, and temporary objects

recommendations.title: Optimize Async/Await Usage
recommendations.description: Ensure all I/O operations are properly async
recommendations.implementation: Audit and convert blocking operations to async equivalents

recommendations.title: Implement Multi-Layer Caching
recommendations.description: Add caching at multiple levels (memory, Redis, CDN)
recommendations.implementation: LRU cache for hot paths, Redis for session data, CDN for static assets

recommendations.title: Connection Pooling
recommendations.implementation: Use SQLAlchemy connection pools with proper sizing

recommendations.title: Implement Performance Profiling
recommendations.implementation: Integrate with APM tools (e.g., New Relic, DataDog)
